participants.name: Ashley Garst
participants.description: Special Event Coordinator at City of Northglenn Government
participants.url: Former Events Coordinator at Arvada Chamber of Commerce

messages.message:
David
Crazy cookout #18 is a clever disguise for a SURPRISE birthday party for Sam. If everybody could help with decorations and alcohol, that would be great. Subway is catering. Also, we need marshmallows for a marshmallow war and feel free to bring implements to execute your own plans.

David
Side dishes and desserts would be helpful too.
